newsitem.title: USA: Wiztec Solutions in cell phone bill deal.
newsitem.headline: Wiztec Solutions in cell phone bill deal.

text.p: Wiztec Solutions Inc said Wednesday it has teamed with Pele-phone Communications Ltd to provide billing and customer services to cellular phone operators worldwide.

Terms of the 50-50 partnership were not disclosed, a Wiztec spokeswoman said. The venture will combine Pele-phone's existing billing system with Wiztec's Wizard system, used currently by pay television operators.
Israel-based Wiztec provides subscriber management services for pay television operators, it said.
Pele-phone, Israel's largest cellular phone operator, is owned evenly by Motorola Inc and Bezeq, the Israeli national telephone company, Wiztec said.
